clearplot
hold on
t = 0:0.01:20;
v = -10 + 8 * exp(-t);
plot(t, v, 'b')
plot([0.0, 0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 2.5, 3.0, 3.5, 4.0, 4.5, 5.0, 5.5, 6.0, 6.5, 7.0, 7.5, 8.0, 8.5, 9.0, 9.5, 10.0, 10.5, 11.0, 11.5, 12.0, 12.5, 13.0, 13.5, 14.0, 14.5, 15.0, 15.5, 16.0, 16.5, 17.0, 17.5, 18.0, 18.5, 19.0, 19.5, 20.0], [-6.0, -8.0, -9.0, -9.5, -9.75, -9.875, -9.9375, -9.96875, -9.984375, -9.9921875, -9.99609375, -9.998046875, -9.9990234375, -9.99951171875, -9.999755859375, -9.9998779296875, -9.99993896484375, -9.999969482421875, -9.999984741210938, -9.999992370605469, -9.999996185302734, -9.999998092651367, -9.999999046325684, -9.999999523162842, -9.999999761581421, -9.99999988079071, -9.999999940395355, -9.999999970197678, -9.999999985098839, -9.99999999254942, -9.99999999627471, -9.999999998137355, -9.999999999068677, -9.999999999534339, -9.99999999976717, -9.999999999883585, -9.999999999941792, -9.999999999970896, -9.999999999985448, -9.999999999992724, -9.999999999996362], 'r')
